title: Can't gift skins
body: I was trying to gift a skin to one of my mates, but the thing is, it doesn't work, when I try to choose skin gifting as my category, it just stuck on the page, but when I try to choose other category, it jumps in straight away, I have also tried to gift somebody else, it works with the skin, so the problem is that I can't gift skin to that specific person. Solutions?

replies.body: Dude what the hell my friend has the same problem I ask him to gift me snow day bard but  he told me that when he clicks "unlock skin for a friend"(which is me) nothing happens. My friend asked some of his other friends to try it and apparently they can't gift me a skin as well  whats even more weird is that my friends have the option to gift me a champion but not a skin? this is really annoying! And snow day bard's sale ends in 4 days ;_;
